name: BISOFT
description: Adding Intelligence to machines is not an easy job, as it involves complex machine(embedded) programming. Though machine programming is fun, there is a steep learning curve and takes a lot of time to master. When we get an idea to build a smart machine/gadget, just the time involved to build one puts us off . And 99% of the time we just let the idea go.  For many of us who have a passion/interest in building machines/robots but no experience get stuck at programming part.  Not anymore !!! Presenting BISOFT, an intuitive easy to use machine programming software. With BISOFT you do not have to waste time in learning and mastering machine programming. Just drag and drop your logic like a flowchart.  All input and output devices can be controlled, automated, monitored and used for computation using our intuitive drag and drop based graphical programmable software.
